techmeme.title: KKR-owned BMC Software plans to split: BMC for enterprise mainframes and BMC Helix for enterprise software; ~66% of BMC Software's ~$2.3B revenue will go to BMC (Liana Baker/Bloomberg)
Glassdoor launches short videos, polls, and images to foster engagement on its platform, and now has 63M monthly unique visitors, up from 55M in early 2021 (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
How Withheld for Privacy and other proxy services that help domain operators shield their identities have turned Iceland into a global hub for illicit activity (New York Times)
Microsoft issues the final Surface Duo 2 security update ahead of its end of support on October 21; the Duo 2, released in October 2021, got one Android update (Zac Bowden/Windows Central)
OpenAI says it suspects that China-linked SweetSpecter tried to phish its employees earlier in 2024, posing as a ChatGPT user to send customer support emails (Seth Fiegerman/Bloomberg)
